Mellow & Sleazy:
Let us take a look at Mellow & Sleazy's journey on the Spotify Top 200 Weekly South Africa chart. 
 He has had a total of 9 songs with approximately 5651169 million streams. 
As of 2022-10-06 , he is with Sound African Recordings
He first appeared on the chart on 2021-09-09. His most recent appearance has been on 2022-10-06
His highest position on the chart is 3 for the song Bopha (feat. DJ Maphorisa, Madumane & Young Stunna) which was at this position on 2021-09-16
His lowest position on the chart is 197 for the song Sporofita (feat. 2woshort, LastbornDiroba, Al xapo & Sunde) which was at this position on 2022-08-18
The songs of his that have appeared on the chart are Beke le Beke (feat. Focalistic) ... Bopha (feat. DJ Maphorisa, Madumane & Young Stunna) ... Chipi ke Chipi ... Possessed Whistle ... Sporofita (feat. 2woshort, LastbornDiroba, Al xapo & Sunde) ... Umshini Ka Zuma (feat. M.J & Azi) ... Wenza Kanjani (feat. 2woshort, TNK MusiQ & BoontleRSA) ... Your Body (feat. DJ Maphorisa) ... Zwonaka
